Content_wSideColumn.Name: Program Details
Content_wSideColumn.Title: YFE Program Details
Content_wSideColumn.Abstract: Program details will give the youth an idea of what to expect at YFE.

MoveLeft.label: Toggle column right or left (right is default)

fbookTop.label: Put facebook at top of page

fbookDisplayed.label: Number of facebook messages to display

Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
We appreciate your interest in the Youth For Excelence program. Due to the increase in the number of students at BYU-Idaho, our department resources are being reassigned to other areas. We will no longer be able to offer many of the programs that we used to provide.  Read Letter to the Community for more information.

We would like to thank you for your past support of our programs. We have had many enjoyable years and appreciate the contributions and value that you brought to our programs. If you are still interested in this type of program, we suggest that you look for other alternatives provided by BYU-Idaho or the community.

View the YFE Video!

What YFE offers you!

  • Church Historical Sites
  • Palmyra Temple
  • Scripture Study Classes
  • Visit the Sacred Grove

See how all of these exciting activities fit into our  Agenda!

Activities


Prepare for YFE

YFE Printable Packing List

Please follow the BYU-Idaho Honor Code's Dress and Grooming Standards for each clothing item. Bare feet, midriffs, tank tops (boys and girls), shorts, capris, flip-flops, etc. are NOT ALLOWED.
Please do not bring video games, TV/DVD equipment, or any other electronics of any kind. Cell phones will not be allowed during any scheduled activity time.

Download our Travel Information for Lodging, and Travel Plans.

After YFE

Keep your YFE experience alive with the following suggestions:

  • Write your thoughts about your experience in your journal.
  • Stay in contact with your friends from YFE. Create a Facebook fan page for your session.
  • Set goals about what you want to accomplish after YFE.
  • Pray for guidance on how you can apply what you learned from YFE.
